1.customerMessage1: (attn) Hey, I need help with something: I just got my order number 684667 and it's the wrong color. I thought it was more aquamarine the one that I saw this is very dark. I don't like it. How do I go about exchanging the color?
1.AgentMessage1: Julie Vos: I'm sorry to hear that the color wasn't what you expected. I understand how disappointing that can be. Please note that due to lighting and screen settings, colors may appear slightly different in person. I just checked, and you ordered an Iridescent London Blue. Can you please send a photo of the item you received showing the color?
1.customerMessage3: The one I saw was much lighter. Do you have an aquamarine color?
1.customerMessage4: The website looked like their same color, but I can see it is not
1.AgentMessage2:
Julie Vos: Thanks for sending the pic, and I'm sorry for the inconvenience! We don't have it Aquamarine, but we do have it in Bahamian Blue here- https://julievos.attn.tv/aPii6LA3s8Ka 
What do you think?
1.customerMessage5: Yes, that's the color. It didn't look like miss color from the tiny little thing I hit on the button. It looked like it was right color, but clearly isn't that.
1.customerMessage6: What are we do next How can I get a exchanged for the color?
1.AgentMessage3: Julie Vos: I'm so sorry for the trouble. Could you share your email address with me? I'll check in with the team right away for you.
1.AgentMessage4:
Julie Vos: Thanks for the details. Before I check this with the team, can you confirm if you've visited returns.julievos.com and selected the option for exchange? 

Please note that returns are processed within 7-10 business days after your item(s) are delivered to us.

send_to_cs: Shipping inquiries on a current order
For product or general inquiries you can't find the answer to, use PGI shortcut
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Don't use the word "unfortunately" to discuss our appointment structure
Don't use the word "best" to reference a product (e.g., best ring, etc.)
templates: If cx are looking for an engagement ring and don't provide specifics, use LER shortcut
dos_and_donts: If the customer responds incorrectly to the journey, don't send jny temp, recommend items based on their selection instead
Cx can create their own engagement ring on the webiste by choosing a setting, stone and size
Cx can customize rings by working with designers who will use their ideas, drawings, images to create the ring they want
Don't disclose the locations of their labs/production facilities

3.customerMessage1: Your website says i could receive up to 30% discount if I qualify for HSA/FSA/HRA.  I have submitted the questionnaire and received the LMN. How do I get my discount?
3.AgentMessage1: Bonafide: Good question! I'll check this now with the team and get back to you as soon as I have a response. Please hang tight!
3.customerMessage2: Also, it says I can save up to 25% when I bundle.  I'm have subscriptions on Thermella, Relizen and the multi-vitamin. It appears as though I'm only getting a 15% discount.  Why is that?
3.AgentMessage2: Bonafide: Can you please send me a screenshot of what you're seeing on your end as a price for the subscription? I'll be more than happy to look into this for you!
3.customerMessage3: The Relizen shows a price reflecting a $30 discount for points applied. Both it and Thermella are typically discounted 15% and the multi-vitamin has no discount currently.  I just recently received the LMN with the most recent ordered placed on Jan 15th.
3.SystemMessage12:
CX: Your website says i could receive up to 30% discount if I qualify for HSA/FSA/HRA. I have submitted the questionnaire and received the LMN. How do I get my discount?

it says I can save up to 25% when I bundle. I'm have subscriptions on Thermella, Relizen and the multi-vitamin. It appears as though I'm only getting a 15% discount. Why is that? Multivitamin not listed as bundle option
3.AgentMessage3: Bonafide: Thanks for the screenshot, and I understand. For our bundle offer, it's Buy 2, save 15% or Buy 3 or more, save 25%. Unfortunately, it looks like the Multivitamin is not part of our bundle offer at this time. I'll check on this with my team as well. I'll keep you posted.

4.AgentMessage2: GreenPan: Good afternoon, Nina! I sincerely apologize for the confusion and the inconvenience this has caused. I don't have access on my end to cancel orders, but our support team can take care of this for you. Please be sure to check your spam or promotions folder, just in case their response landed there. Alternatively, you can give our team a call at 877-926-6526, and they'll be able to cancel the order. We genuinely appreciate your understanding and patience.
4.customerMessage5: I have called it several times and I just called again. It says they are closed and to send a email.But I haven't sent about 5 emails and gotten no response
4.SystemMessage6: Template used: "No response from customer support - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 17:43:52.689
4.AgentMessage3: GreenPan: I'm really sorry about this and I understand how frustrating this is. I recommend not sending any more emails as our team handles emails in the order they come in and sending additional ones will further delay the team's response. Rest assured that someone will follow up with you as soon as they can.

5.AgentMessage1: Cozy Earth: I would be more than happy to help out, ask away!
5.customerMessage2: Thank you! Ok, I ordered two sets of XL twin sheets on January 9th. I had to do them separately, so my FSA would pay for them. I was supposed to get a free robe, but couldn't because they are separate orders. Is there anyway I can get it?? I spent what I needed to spend??
5.AgentMessage2: Cozy Earth: Thank you for explaining! I see why you were expecting to receive the free robe since you met the spending threshold. At this time, the free robe promotion requires that the qualifying purchase be placed under a single order, and unfortunately we're not able to combine separate orders or apply the promotion retroactively. I'm very sorry for the disappointment this causes, and I truly appreciate you taking the time to reach out and explain the situation.
